attributes.action: support investigation into road pricing as a way to reduce congestion and impact on climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must act together to reduce car usage.  Though we all value our independence and love the convenience of our own cars, we need to act to reduce our impact on global warming, use of the world resources and the creation of congestion which stops the proper business of those who have no other option.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
